= Python SOS Client & Server architecture =

_1/8/2013. Just an initial scratchpad. I'll grow this soon. -Emilio_

== Key high-level libraries, code, groups ==

Roughly ordered from higher to lower level, in focus.

  * [NANOOSNVSPythonSOS NANOOS SOS]. Server software.
  * *[https://github.com/swtools/ WOFpy/ulmo/pyhis group]. Based in Austin.*
    * [https://github.com/swtools/WOFpy WOFpy]. Server software.
    * [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/ulmo/ ulmo]. Client software. Don't know what happened to [ the github page that used to be there
    * [https://github.com/swtools/pyhis pyhis]. Client software. Deprecated, being replaced by ulmo
  * [https://github.com/asascience-open/pyoos pyoos]. Client software.
  * [http://geopython.github.com/OWSLib/ OWSLib]. Mostly client.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/netcdf4-python/ netcdf4-python]. Mostly client.
  * [http://pydap.org Pydap]. Server/Client.

== Mailing lists and groups ==

  * [http://librelist.com/browser/pywaterdata/ pywaterdata email list]. Currently limited to the WOFpy/ulmo/pyhis group
  * [http://code.google.com/p/waterpython/ Water Python Google Code group]. Never really got off the ground after a bit of enthusiasm back in early 2010 (Chris Barker, Rob Hetland, etc). But could be repurposed....
